Package alice.respect.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IEnvironmentContext  
    ILinkContext  
    IManagementContext
    Basic Management Interface for a RespecT Tuple Centre.
    IOrdinaryAsynchInterface
    A ReSpecT Tuple Centre Interface to issue ReSpecT ordinary primitives using an asynchronous semantics.
    IOrdinarySynchInterface
    A ReSpecT Tuple Centre Interface to issue ReSpecT ordinary primitives using a synchronous semantics.
    IRemoteLinkProvider  
    IRespectOperation
    ReSpecT Operation Interface.
    IRespectProxy  
    IRespectTC
    Basic usage interface of a RespecT Tuple Centre
    ISpecificationAsynchInterface
    A ReSpecT Tuple Centre Interface to issue ReSpecT specification primitives using an asynchronous semantics.
    ISpecificationSynchInterface
    A ReSpecT Tuple Centre Interface to issue ReSpecT specification primitives using a synchronous semantics.
    ITCRegistry  
    ITimedContext
    Interface to a ReSpecT Tuple Centre with timing functionalities.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Agent
    Base class for building ReSpecT agents.
    AgentId
    Agent identifier.
    EnvId  
    Respect2PLibrary
    TuProlog library defining the behaviour of ReSpecT primitives, used inside ReSpecT VM.
    RespectOpId  
    RespectSpecification
    Specification of a tuple centre behaviour encoded in the ReSpecT language.
    TupleCentreId
    Tuple centre identifier for ReSpecT tuple centres A tuple centre identifier must be a ground logic term.
